label: Contractor Employees must be entered into CTS database
quote: All Contractor Employees must be entered into the current agency Contractor Tracking System (CTS) database by the COR or Alternate COR.

label: CPM shall provide timely start information for CTS entry
quote: The Contractor Project Manager (CPM) shall provide timely start information to the CO/COR or designated government personnel to initiate the CTS entry.

label: CPM must have active CBP Background Investigation and AD account
quote: The CPM must have an active CBP Background Investigation (BI) and an Active Directory (AD) account (i.e., email, etc.) within the agency.

label: CPM shall provide Contractor Employee departure/separation date and reason
quote: CPM shall provide Contactor Employee departure/separation date and reason for leaving to the CO/COR in accordance with CBP Directive 1210-007B, Tracking of Contractor Employees.

label: Contractor Employee shall comply with CBP security controls
quote: The Contractor Employee shall comply with the U.S. Customs and Border Protection’s (CBP) administrative, physical, and technical security controls to ensure that the Government’s security requirements are met.

label: All Contractor Employees must wear identification access badges in CBP facilities
quote: All Contractor Employees under this contract must wear identification access badges when working in CBP facilities.

label: All badges, PIV cards, passes, keys must be returned prior to departure/separation
quote: Prior to Contractor Employees’ departure/separation, all badges, valid HSPD-12 compliant Personal Identity Verification (PIV) card, building passes, parking permits, keys, and pass cards must be returned to the Contracting Officer’s Representative (COR).

label: COR shall immediately notify Physical Security official to revoke access upon separation
quote: The COR shall immediately notify the cognizant Physical Security official to ensure that access to all buildings, and facilities, and network are revoked.

label: OPR/SMD shall be notified immediately if building access is revoked in NCR
quote: For contracts within the National Capitol Region (NCR), the Office of Professional Responsibility, Security Management Division (OPR/SMD) shall be notified immediately, if building access is revoked.

label: Contractor Employees with valid PIV card are authorized to access HQs on official business
quote: Contractor Employees in possession of a valid HSPD-12 compliant PIV card are authorized to access Department Headquarters and DHS Component Headquarters while on official business, in accordance with DHS Instruction Manual # 121-01-011-01, Revision # 00.

label: Contractor Employees may be subject to random security screening
quote: Contractor Employees may be subject to random security screening upon entering certain CBP facilities.
